title: The Missing Link in Cybersecurity: Culture
content:
Cybersecurity culture is vital to strengthening a businessâ€™s first line of defense: Employee security practices. Most cyberattacks on businesses today target employees first. By building a supportive workplace culture that motivates employees to improve their security awareness, businesses can reduce their cyber risks.

How can business leaders go about creating a cybersecurity culture on their teams? A few core principles offer a good place to start.
